Title: More Candles!
Description:
I, er, we...no, no, I! I have new deal for you, oh shadowy one. 

More candles! 

In return, you get... er...

<Frantic shuffling reveals a new voice.>

You get more candles! Then you give to us! To me! 

Candles! Candles! Candles!

<The excitedly whispered chanting continues for some time.>
ObjectivesText: Steal more candles for the suspicious vent in the Gundargaz Inn.
